thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 04 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Entertainment One Sees Full Year Performance For Group To March 31 In Line With Expectations​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Entertainment One Sees Full Year Performance For Group To March 31 In Line With Expectations​
text:
April 4 (Reuters) - Entertainment One Ltd:
* ‍PERFORMANCE FOR YEAR HAS BEEN IN LINE WITH MANAGEMENT EXPECTATIONS, CONSISTENT WITH TRENDS HIGHLIGHTED IN INTERIM RESULTS​
* ‍STRONG PERFORMANCE OVER FIRST SIX MONTHS OF FINANCIAL YEAR HAS CONTINUED INTO SECOND HALF​
* ‍REPORTED REVENUES FOR FULL YEAR ARE ANTICIPATED TO BE AROUND 50% HIGHER THAN PRIOR YEAR, WITH A SIMILAR TREND IN UNDERLYING EBITDA​
* ‍ANTICIPATES THAT FULL YEAR PERFORMANCE FOR GROUP TO 31 MARCH 2018 WILL BE IN LINE WITH ITS EXPECTATIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
